mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedules VALUES (NULL, #{instructorid}, #{custid},#{starttime},DATE_ADD(#{starttime},INTERVAL 1 HOUR),"예약 진행 중")
mapper.update: UPDATE schedules SET instructorid=#{instructorid}, custid=#{custid},starttime=#{starttime}, endtime=DATE_ADD(NOW(),INTERVAL #{period} MONTH) WHERE schedulesid=#{schedulesid}
mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(s.starttime,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i") as time, i.instructorname , c.custname FROM schedules s INNER join instructor i ON i.instructorid=s.instructorid INNER join facility f ON f.facilityid=i.facilityid INNER join admin a ON f.facilityid=a.facilityid INNER join cust c ON c.custid=s.custid WHERE s.starttime>NOW() AND status="예약 완료" AND a.aid=#{aid} ORDER BY s.starttime;
